description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Brazil, the River Plate, and the Falkland Islands; with the Cape Horn Route to Australia. Hotham, etc" Author: HADFIELD, William - Secretary to the South American and General Steam Navigation Company Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10481.d.23."
